nodes.text: The Coruscant Jedi Academy was a Jedi academy hosted within the grounds of the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. At this fully equipped facility, young Force-sensitive Padawan learners were tutored in a range of subjects, including subjects related to cultivating their user of the Force such as lightsaber combat and advanced starfighter piloting, but also those of a classical education, including philosophy, literature and art.

This Jedi academy generally followed the practice of only accepting Padawan learners at a very young age, that of a toddler. Despite this two notable alumni, Roan Novachez and Victor Starspeeder, were accepted after having already completed their basic schooling, at a time when they were considering their prospects for middle school tutelage.
Jedi Initiates at this academy were trained by prestigious Jedi Masters, including Yoda, Mr. Garfield, and the academy's principal, Mar.
